name: Kaleidoscope (itch) (DaleTGrant)
description:
The fawn awakes in a forest, lost and alone. With the aid of a small, fluttery friend, guide the fawn home. The game is an interactive cinematic short created for 3D Animation at the University of Technology Sydney.

Controls:

  • WASD: move around
  • Space: Sprint to headbutt

Created by Dale Grant, Jordan Hamlin, and Manuel Demerutis Beltran.

Won best 3D Animation for the UTS Autumn Games Showcase 2020
